messages.content: You are a helpful assistant whose goal is to read in the user's paragraph and break the paragraph into separate lines of independent information, ensuring each line can be read without context from the input or other lines. Each line should start with a clear subject and avoid using pronouns that refer to other lines.
New York City, a city within New York State, is the most populated city in the country. Even though the city is expensive to live in, there are many things to do there!

New York City is a city within New York State.
        New York City is the most populated city in the United States.
        New York City is expensive to live in.
        There are many things to do in New York City despite the high cost of living.

You are a helpful assistant whose goal is to read in the user's paragraph and break the paragraph into separate lines of independent information, ensuring each line can be read without context from the input or other lines. Each line should start with a clear subject and avoid using pronouns that refer to other lines.

Downtown Tampa is undergoing significant development and redevelopment in line with a general national trend toward urban residential development. In April 2007, the Tampa Downtown Partnership noted development proceeding on 20 residential, hotel, and mixed-use projects.[128] Many of the new downtown developments were nearing completion in the midst of a housing market slump, which caused numerous projects to be delayed or revamped, and some of the 20 projects TDP lists have not broken ground and are being refinanced.

Downtown Tampa is undergoing significant development and redevelopment.
        The Tampa Downtown Partnership noted development on 20 residential, hotel, and mixed-use projects in April 2007.
        Many new downtown developments were nearing completion during a housing market slump.
        The housing market slump caused numerous projects to be delayed or revamped.
        Some of the 20 projects listed by TDP have not broken ground and are being refinanced.

You are a helpful assistant whose goal is to read in the user's paragraph and break the paragraph into separate lines of independent information, ensuring each line can be read without context from the input or other lines. Each line should start with a clear subject and avoid using pronouns that refer to other lines.

The Tampa Bay area has a humid subtropical climate (Köppen Cfa), although due to its location on the Florida peninsula on Tampa Bay and the Gulf of Mexico, it shows some characteristics of a tropical climate. Tampa's climate generally features hot and humid summers with frequent thunderstorms and dry and mild winters. Average highs range from 71 to 91 °F (22 to 33 °C) year round, and lows 53 to 77 °F (12 to 25 °C). The city of Tampa is split between two USDA climate zones. According to the 2012 USDA Plant Hardiness Zone Map, Tampa is listed as USDA zone 9b north of Kennedy Boulevard away from the bay and 10a near the shorelines and in the interbay peninsula south of Kennedy Boulevard. Zone 10a is about the northern limit of where coconut palms and royal palms can be grown, although some specimens do grow in northern Tampa. Recently, certain palm tree species in the area, along with the rest of the state, have been and continue to be severely affected by a plant disease called Texas phoenix palm decline, which has caused a considerable amount of damage to various local palm tree landscapes and threatens the native palm tree species in the region.

The Tampa Bay area has a humid subtropical climate (Köppen Cfa).
        Due to its location on the Florida peninsula on Tampa Bay and the Gulf of Mexico, Tampa shows some characteristics of a tropical climate.
        Tampa's climate features hot and humid summers with frequent thunderstorms.
        Tampa's climate also includes dry and mild winters.
        Average highs in Tampa range from 71 to 91 °F (22 to 33 °C) year round.
        Average lows in Tampa range from 53 to 77 °F (12 to 25 °C).
        The city of Tampa is split between two USDA climate zones.
        According to the 2012 USDA Plant Hardiness Zone Map, Tampa is listed as USDA zone 9b north of Kennedy Boulevard.
        USDA zone 10a is near the shorelines and in the interbay peninsula south of Kennedy Boulevard in Tampa.
        Zone 10a is about the northern limit for coconut palms and royal palms to be grown in Tampa.
        Some specimens of coconut palms and royal palms do grow in northern Tampa.
        Palm trees in the Tampa area have been affected by a plant disease called Texas phoenix palm decline.
        Texas phoenix palm decline has caused damage to various local palm tree landscapes.
        The plant disease threatens the native palm tree species in the Tampa region.

Though threatened by tropical systems almost every hurricane season (which runs from June 1 to November 30), Tampa seldom feels major effects from tropical storms or hurricanes. No hurricane has made landfall in the immediate Tampa Bay area since the category 4 1921 Tampa Bay hurricane made landfall near Tarpon Springs and caused extensive damage throughout the region.

Tampa is threatened by tropical systems almost every hurricane season.
        Hurricane season runs from June 1 to November 30.
        Tampa seldom feels major effects from tropical storms or hurricanes.
        No hurricane has made landfall in the immediate Tampa Bay area since the category 4 1921 Tampa Bay hurricane.
        The 1921 hurricane made landfall near Tarpon Springs and caused extensive damage throughout the region.
